thread.title: Fit-again Godfred Donsah expected to return this week for Bologna
thread.title_full: Fit-again Godfred Donsah expected to return this week for Bologna

title: Fit-again Godfred Donsah expected to return this week for Bologna
text:
14:25 CET Fit-again Godfred Donsah expected to return this week for Bologna - www.ghanasoccernet.com Godfred Donsah 
Ghana midfielder Godfred Donsah is set to make a return next week for his Serie A side Bologna. 
The 20-year-old has been sidelined for the past three weeks after hurting his right thigh in training. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us Divided we are weak: united, Africa could become one of the greatest forces for good in the world. By: Osagyefo Dr Kwame Nk
